goal.tools.mc.property.ltl2aut

Class LTL2AUTCover

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.property.ltl2aut.LTL2AUTCover

  • public class LTL2AUTCover
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a single (public) methods for cover computation, as described in Daniele et al. (1999) for LTL2AUT.
    Author:
    sungshik

        Computes the cover of the specified set of formulas.
